DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study Valganciclovir Hydrochloride Tablets 450 mg Under Fed Condition
DOC.detailed_description: Open label , balance , randomize , two-treatment , two-period , two-sequence , cross , single dose , oral bioequivalence study Valganciclovir Hydrochloride Tablets 450 mg Fed condition .
